data.title: Great service from Frank
data.text: Tried one of these in Washington a few years ago and decided to give it a shot while here in Lexington, KY. Frank took our order and was very helpful with recommendations. The food did not disappoint! The Korean BBQ meatballs were great!

data.title: Above and beyond Fast Casual
data.text: Noodles and Company does an excellent job for a fast casual restaurant. I'm always greeted by smiling energetic staff. It's a bit unnerving at first as it's pretty well a new concept and you don't know what you want the first time in. Staff does a real nice job directing you to something you are going to enjoy. Personal favorite for me is the mac and cheese, also have enjoyed the Pad Thai. The owner Chad is often in there greeting customers and has even called after a delivery before to make sure everything was exactly as I would have expected. Delivery on bikes is really cool. Awesome fast casual pasta place. Can't beat the location on Limestone.

data.title: Can't beat their Mac n cheese!
data.text:
Delicious and not overly cheesy. Just don't looks at the calorie count! 

Also loooove that they deliver. I've gotten it delivered to the hospital multiple times and they are always under 20 minutes!

data.title: Good food, but not much for the price
data.text: I had the Japanese Pan Noodles and they were quite tasty. However, there just wasn't as much food as I was expecting for the price. I added the side salad to bulk things up a bit and it was a joke, seeming like they threw a few lettuce leaves in a bowl. For $1.50, I was disappointed. Good food, but if you're hungry, go somewhere else.

data.title: Pleasantly surprised
data.text: I've tried Noodles and Company's dishes before; some friends got it for lunch and I stole a bite. Overall, I didn't see the hype. I would have said that the food what over-priced and wasn't tasty. Although, today I decided to go into the restaurant and try a meal for myself. I stood by the menu wall for a minute when an employee approached me and asked if I'd dined with them before. She laid everything out and pointed me toward their Thai Hot Pot. I ordered it and really liked it. All of the staff were friendly and welcoming. Definitely a place to go to.
